languages.text: {n}Бывший Наместник {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}вымотан{/d}, очки не скрывают теней под глазами. Воротник кителя засален и расстегнут, под ним виден сетчатый материал скрытой брони, усиленной керамитовыми чешуйками. Прямо возле горла красуется вмятина от пули. Однако этот усталый человек отнюдь не кажется сдавшимся — губы его сжаты, движения резки, а из-под подвернутых рукавов выглядывают бандитские татуировки — напоминание, кем был Владайм Токара до того, как воссесть на трон Наместника.{/n}

{n}The former Liege looks {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}exhausted{/d}. His glasses cannot hide the circles under his eyes. His coat collar is greasy and unbuttoned, showing the meshwork of the ceramite-reinforced armour hidden underneath. There is a conspicuous dent right beside his throat, left by a bullet. However, as tired as he is, the man is showing no sign of having given up: his lips are pressed together in a hard line; his movements are sharp; and the bandit tattoos under his rolled-up sleeves are a reminder of who Vladaym Tocara was before taking the Liege's throne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位前任总督看起来{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}筋疲力尽{/d}，眼睛完全挡不住他的黑眼圈。他的衣领油腻腻的，扣子也没扣上，露出了藏在下面的陶钢强化护甲。他的喉咙旁边有个明显的凹痕，是子弹留下的。不过，虽然他看起来已经疲惫不堪，但却丝毫没有放弃的迹象。他的嘴唇紧紧抿在一起，动作十分利落，卷起的袖子下面刻着强盗的纹身，时刻提醒别人他在坐上总督宝座之前是个什么样的人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege looks {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}exhausted{/d}. His glasses cannot hide the circles under his eyes. His coat collar is greasy and unbuttoned, showing the meshwork of the ceramite-reinforced armour hidden underneath. There is a conspicuous dent right beside his throat, left by a bullet. However, as tired as he is, the man is showing no sign of having given up: his lips are pressed together in a hard line; his movements are sharp; and the bandit tattoos under his rolled-up sleeves are a reminder of who Vladaym Tocara was before taking the Liege's throne.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位前任总督看起来筋疲力尽，眼睛完全挡不住他的黑眼圈。他的衣领油腻腻的，扣子也没扣上，露出了藏在下面的陶钢强化护甲。他的喉咙旁边有个明显的凹痕，是子弹留下的。不过，虽然他看起来已经疲惫不堪，但却丝毫没有放弃的迹象。他的嘴唇紧紧抿在一起，动作十分利落，卷起的袖子下面刻着强盗的纹身，时刻提醒别人他在坐上总督宝座之前是个什么样的人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}元君主は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}疲れ切っている{/d}。眼鏡の上からでも、クマがよく見える。コートの襟は脂っぽくボタンは外れている。おかげで下に着ているセラマイト補強の鎧の網目が、顔を出しており、喉のすぐ脇には銃弾の跡が目立つ。しかし、こんなにも疲れ切っているにもかかわらず、この男は全く諦めていない。唇を強く噛みしめ、身体の動きは鋭く、捲り上げた袖の下から見える盗賊の刺青は、君主の座に就く前のヴラダイム・トカラの姿を思い出させる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege looks {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}exhausted{/d}. His glasses cannot hide the circles under his eyes. His coat collar is greasy and unbuttoned, showing the meshwork of the ceramite-reinforced armour hidden underneath. There is a conspicuous dent right beside his throat, left by a bullet. However, as tired as he is, the man is showing no sign of having given up: his lips are pressed together in a hard line; his movements are sharp; and the bandit tattoos under his rolled-up sleeves are a reminder of who Vladaym Tocara was before taking the Liege's throne.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}元君主は疲れ切っている。眼鏡の上からでも、クマがよく見える。コートの襟は脂っぽくボタンは外れている。おかげで下に着ているセラミット補強の鎧の網目が、顔を出しており、喉のすぐ脇には銃弾の跡が目立つ。しかし、こんなにも疲れ切っているにもかかわらず、この男は全く諦めていない。唇を噛みしめ、身体の動きは鋭く、捲り上げた袖の下から見える盗賊の刺青は、君主の座に就く前のヴラダイム・トカラの姿を思い出させる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El antiguo Señor está {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}agotado{/d}. Sus gafas no disimulan las ojeras. El cuello de su chaqueta está grasiento y desabrochado, dejando ver la malla de la armadura reforzada con ceramita que esconde debajo. Justo al lado de la garganta tiene una abolladura, causada por una bala. Sin embargo, por muy cansado que esté, el hombre no da señales de haberse rendido. Tiene los labios apretados en una fina línea, se mueve con brusquedad y los tatuajes bajo las mangas arremangadas recuerdan quién era Vladaym Tocara antes de ocupar el trono.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege looks {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}exhausted{/d}. His glasses cannot hide the circles under his eyes. His coat collar is greasy and unbuttoned, showing the meshwork of the ceramite-reinforced armour hidden underneath. There is a conspicuous dent right beside his throat, left by a bullet. However, as tired as he is, the man is showing no sign of having given up: his lips are pressed together in a hard line; his movements are sharp; and the bandit tattoos under his rolled-up sleeves are a reminder of who Vladaym Tocara was before taking the Liege's throne.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Está agotado. Sus gafas no disimulan las ojeras. El cuello de su chaqueta está grasiento y desabrochado, dejando ver la malla de la armadura reforzada con ceramita que esconde debajo. Justo al lado de la garganta tiene una abolladura, causada por una bala. Sin embargo, por muy cansado que esté, el hombre no da señales de haberse rendido. Tiene los labios apretados, se mueve con brusquedad y los tatuajes bajo las mangas arremangadas recuerdan quién era Vladaym Tocara antes de ocupar el trono.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der ehemalige Lehnsherr ist {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}erschöpft{/d}. Seine Brille kann die Ringe unter seinen Augen nicht verbergen. Der Kragen seines Mantels ist fettig und nicht zugeknöpft. Das Gitterwerk der ceramit-verstärkten Rüstung darunter ist zu sehen. Unmittelbar neben seiner Kehle ist eine auffällige Delle zu sehen, die von einer Kugel stammt. Aber so müde er auch ist, dieser Mann zeigt keinerlei Anzeichen, dass er aufgegeben hätte. Seine Lippen sind fest zusammengepresst. Seine Bewegungen sind scharf. Und die Banditentattoos unter seinen hochgekrempelten Ärmeln erinnern daran, wer Vladaym Tocara war, bevor er den Thron des Lehnsherren bestiegen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege looks {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}exhausted{/d}. His glasses cannot hide the circles under his eyes. His coat collar is greasy and unbuttoned, showing the meshwork of the ceramite-reinforced armour hidden underneath. There is a conspicuous dent right beside his throat, left by a bullet. However, as tired as he is, the man is showing no sign of having given up: his lips are pressed together in a hard line; his movements are sharp; and the bandit tattoos under his rolled-up sleeves are a reminder of who Vladaym Tocara was before taking the Liege's throne.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der ehemalige Lehnsherr ist erschöpft. Seine Brille kann die Ringe unter seinen Augen nicht verbergen. Der Kragen seines Mantels ist fettig und nicht zugeknöpft. Das Gitterwerk der ceramit-verstärkten Rüstung darunter ist zu sehen. Unmittelbar neben seiner Kehle ist eine auffällige Delle zu sehen, die von einer Kugel stammt. Aber so müde er auch ist, dieser Mann zeigt keinerlei Anzeichen, dass er aufgegeben hätte. Seine Lippen sind zusammengepresst. Seine Bewegungen sind scharf. Und die Banditentattoos unter seinen hochgekrempelten Ärmeln erinnern daran, wer Vladaym Tocara war, bevor er den Thron des Lehnsherren bestiegen hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'ancien suzerain est {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}exténué{/d}, comme en attestent ses cernes si marqués que ses lunettes ne parviennent pas à les cacher. Le col de son manteau est gras et déboutonné, laissant apparaître les mailles de l'armure renforcée de céramique qu'il porte en dessous. Près de sa gorge, vous voyez la trace qu'une balle a laissée sur le métal. Malgré sa fatigue, il ne montre aucun signe de désarroi. Il a les lèvres pincées, ses gestes sont précis et les tatouages ornant ses bras sous ses manches retroussées rappellent le bandit qu'il était avant de monter sur le trône de suzerain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The former Liege looks {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}exhausted{/d}. His glasses cannot hide the circles under his eyes. However, as tired as he is, the man is showing no sign of having given up: his lips are pressed together in a hard line; his movements are sharp; and the bandit tattoos under his rolled-up sleeves are a reminder of who Vladaym Tocara was before taking the Liege's throne.{/n}
